availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathan W. Gould (Henry County, Kentucky, druggist)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, druggist. New York native. Married to Susan Gould. Father of Ella Gould and Catharine Gould. Druggist in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 147-48.
Find A Grave, "N. W. Gould (March 31, 1831-January 12, 1902)," Memorial #108508643, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/108508643 (accessed August 1, 2018).
